Sudah Minta Maaf, Polantas yang Pukul Sopir Ambulans Tetap Ditindak
03 Nov 2019, 09:41 by Audrey Santoso
Jakarta - Viral di media sosial sebuah video yang memperlihatkan cekcok antara seorang oknum polisi di Tebing Tinggi, Sumatera Utara (Sumut) dengan sopir ambulans yang sedang membawa pasien. Kedua belah pihak sudah saling memaafkan dan sepakat berdamai, namun si oknum polisi tetap akan menjalani proses sidang disiplin untuk mempertanggungjawabkan sikapnya.
"Sabtu, tanggal 2 November 2019, sekira pukul 15.00 WIB telah berlangsung mediasi di ruangan Sie Propam Polres Tebing Tinggi. Sudah saling memaafkan antara Brigadir UMP dengan supir ambulans. Bahwa kejadian tersebut karena kesalahpahaman," kata Kapolres Tebing Tinggi AKBP Sunadi kepada detikcom, Sabtu (2/11/2019).
AKBP Sunadi menuturkan sebagai anggota Polri, sikap Brigadir UMP tak mencerminkan budaya senyum, sapa, salam (3S). Sikapnya juga dinilai tak menunjukan sosok polisi yang profesional, modern, terpercaya (promoter).
"Tetap kita tindak. Harusnya kan mengedepankan senyum, sapa salam, promoter," ujar Sunadi.

Already Apologizing, Traffic Police Who Hit Ambulance Drivers Still Acted
03 Nov 2019, 09:41 by Audrey Santoso
Jakarta - Viral on social media, a video showing a bicker between a police officer in Tebing Tinggi, North Sumatra (North Sumatra) and an ambulance driver carrying a patient. Both parties have forgiven each other and agreed to make peace, but the police officer will still undergo a disciplinary hearing process to take responsibility for his attitude.
"Saturday, November 2, 2019, at around 15:00 West Indonesia Time mediation took place in the Tebing Tinggi Police Sie Propam room. It has forgiven each other between the UMP Brigadier and the ambulance driver. That the incident was due to a misunderstanding," AKBP Tebing Tinggi Police Chief told AFP on Saturday. (2/11/2019).
AKBP Sunadi said as a member of the National Police, the attitude of the UMP Brigadier did not reflect the culture of smiles, greetings, greetings (3S). His attitude was also considered not to show the figure of a professional, modern, trusted police (promoter).
"We will continue to act. We should put forward a smile, greetings, promoters," said Sunadi.
